rukus.text: And Abraham said: "My Lord, make this town a sanctuary, and keep me and my sons away from serving idols
My Lord, they have misguided many from amongst mankind. So, whoever follows me, then he is of me, and whoever disobeys me, then You are Forgiving, Merciful

My Lord, I have resided part of my progeny in an uncultivated valley near your Restricted Sanctuary. My Lord, so that they may hold the contact-method. So let the hearts of the people incline towards them and give provisions to them of the fruits that they may give thanks
Our Lord, you know what we hide and what we declare. And nothing is hidden from God at all in the Earth or in the heavens
Praise be to God who has granted me in my old age Ishmael and Isaac. My Lord is the hearer of prayers
My Lord, let me hold the contact-method, and also from my progeny. Our Lord, accept my prayer
Our Lord, forgive me and my parents, and the believers on the Day the judgment is called
